com.netflix.nicobar.cassandra

Interface CassandraGateway

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CassandraGatewayImpl

    public interface CassandraGateway
    Common cassandra CRUD operations.

      • getKeyspace

        com.netflix.astyanax.Keyspace getKeyspace()
        Return the keyspace that this gateway provides access to.
        Returns:
        the Cassandra keyspace.

      • getColumnFamily

        java.lang.String getColumnFamily()
        Return the column family that this gateway provides access to.
        Returns:
        a cassandra column family name.

      • upsert

        void upsert(java.lang.String rowKey,
          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> attributes)
        Performs an insert/update for a row in Cassandra.
        Parameters:
        rowKey - the row key to use for insertions.
        attributes - map of column names to column values.

      • upsert

        void upsert(java.lang.String rowKey,
          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> attributes,
          int ttlSeconds)
        Performs an insert/update for a row in Cassandra.
        Parameters:
        rowKey - the row key to use for insertions
        attributes - map of column names to column values.
        ttlSeconds - how long should columns in this upsert live.

      • deleteRow

        void deleteRow(java.lang.String rowKey)
        Deletes a row in Cassandra.
        Parameters:
        rowKey - the key of the row to delete.

      • deleteColumn

        void deleteColumn(java.lang.String rowKey,
                java.lang.String column)
        Deletes a column from a row in Cassandra.
        Parameters:
        rowKey - the key of the row containing the column.
        column - the name of the column to delete.

        Parameters:

      • getRow

        com.netflix.astyanax.model.ColumnList<java.lang.String> getRow(java.lang.String rowKey)
        Gets all columns for the specified row.
        Parameters:
        rowKey - a single row key.
        Returns:
        list of columns for the row, possibly null.

      • getRows

        com.netflix.astyanax.model.Rows<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getRows(java.lang.String... rowKeys)
        Gets all columns for all the listed row keys.
        Parameters:
        rowKeys - a list of row keys.
        Returns:
        list of rows, possibly null.
